005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.BindingException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.info.IFeatureComplexItemValueHandler;
011
012import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
013import java.lang.reflect.Method;
014import java.util.Map;
015import java.util.function.Predicate;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
019
020/**
021 * Represents a field or assembly instance bound to Java class.
022 */
023public interface IBoundDefinitionModelComplex
024    extends IBoundDefinitionModel<IBoundObject>, IFeatureComplexItemValueHandler {
025
026  @NonNull
027  Map<String, IBoundProperty<?>> getJsonProperties(@Nullable Predicate<IBoundInstanceFlag> flagFilter);
028
029  @Override
030  default boolean isInline() {
031    return getBoundClass().getEnclosingClass() != null;
032  }
033
034  @Nullable
035  Method getBeforeDeserializeMethod();
036
037  /**
038   * Calls the method named "beforeDeserialize" on each class in the object's
039   * hierarchy if the method exists on the class.
040   * <p>
041   * These methods can be used to set the initial state of the target bound object
042   * before data is read and applied during deserialization.
043   *
044   * @param targetObject
045   *          the data object target to call the method(s) on
046   * @param parentObject
047   *          the object target's parent object, which is used as the method
048   *          argument
049   * @throws BindingException
050   *           if an error occurs while calling the method
051   */
052  @Override
053  default void callBeforeDeserialize(IBoundObject targetObject, IBoundObject parentObject) throws BindingException {
054    Method beforeDeserializeMethod = getBeforeDeserializeMethod();
055    if (beforeDeserializeMethod != null) {
056      try {
057        beforeDeserializeMethod.invoke(targetObject, parentObject);
058      } catch (IllegalAccessException | IllegalArgumentException | InvocationTargetException ex) {
059        throw new BindingException(ex);
060      }
061    }
062  }
063
064  @Nullable
065  Method getAfterDeserializeMethod();
066
067  /**
068   * Calls the method named "afterDeserialize" on each class in the object's
069   * hierarchy if the method exists.
070   * <p>
071   * These methods can be used to modify the state of the target bound object
072   * after data is read and applied during deserialization.
073   *
074   * @param targetObject
075   *          the data object target to call the method(s) on
076   * @param parentObject
077   *          the object target's parent object, which is used as the method
078   *          argument
079   * @throws BindingException
080   *           if an error occurs while calling the method
081   */
082  @Override
083  default void callAfterDeserialize(IBoundObject targetObject, IBoundObject parentObject) throws BindingException {
084    Method afterDeserializeMethod = getAfterDeserializeMethod();
085    if (afterDeserializeMethod != null) {
086      try {
087        afterDeserializeMethod.invoke(targetObject, parentObject);
088      } catch (IllegalAccessException | IllegalArgumentException | InvocationTargetException ex) {
089        throw new BindingException(ex);
090      }
091    }
092  }
093
094  // @Override
095  // public String getJsonKeyFlagName() {
096  // // definition items never have a JSON key
097  // return null;
098  // }
099
100}
